title: Python 3.12.0 beta 4 released
content:
Python 3.12 beta 4 has been released, bringing with it some exciting new features and changes. This beta preview gives developers a chance to test and provide feedback before the final release.

Some of the major new features and changes in Python 3.12 include:

  • [Feature 1]
  • [Feature 2]
  • [Feature 3]

To get more details on the changes in Python 3.12, you can check out the "What's new in Python 3.12" page. The next pre-release, 3.12.0rc1, is scheduled for July 31, 2023.

If you want to download Python 3.12 beta 4, you can visit the official Python website. Don't forget to subscribe to stay updated with the latest Python news and releases.

Happy coding with Python 3.12!
